d:
Cyberpunk 2077 – Once You Go Black, You Never Go Back | Scyxar Studios Comic

Genre: NTR, BBC, psychological erotica, slow corruption, dark romance
Age Rating: 18+

When loyalty meets desire, and pride meets temptation… there’s no going back.

In the neon-lit chaos of Night City, every choice has a cost — and every pleasure hides a price.
Once You Go Black, You Never Go Back explores the slow, dangerous unraveling of Panam Palmer — the proud, loyal nomad — and the quiet descent of V, the man who loves her, into submission and obsession.

What begins as a harmless flirtation spirals into a series of encounters that blur the line between curiosity and betrayal. Drawn to the raw confidence and power of the black mercenaries who roam the city’s underground, Panam begins to change — not just in what she does, but in what she wants.

V watches helplessly as the woman he thought he knew slips away, one daring choice at a time — until love becomes voyeurism, and trust turns into humiliation. But deep down… does he really want her to stop?

Changelog:
2025-12-14: Chapter 1
2026-01-25: Chapter 2
